item.title: 2023-04-06近期总结
item.description: 简介 总结下近期的学习 详细学习PostgreSQL下的锁分析，涵盖table lock，row lock 学习了微服务的设计理念和架构 接触了plurals

item.title: windows相关
item.description: 简介 总结下windows相关课程和资料 概述 视频 书籍 windows Windows Presentation Foundation Masterclass Windows Kernel Programming Pavel Yosifovich Unit Testing for C# Developers Windows 10 System Programming Pavel Yosifovich complete C# Programming Course Beginner to Expert Windows 10 System Programming Part 2 Getting Started With Reverse Engineering By Josh Stroschein Windows 11 Internals

item.title: 后端学习资料

item.title: 学习资料记录
item.description: 简介 最近休息了一段时间,总结下自己在这段时间看的资料和书籍 概述 视频 书籍 docker Docker for the Absolute Beginner - Hands On - DevOps Learn Docker in a Month of Lunches-Manning Publications (2020) database Fundamentals of Database Engineering Kubernetes Kubernetes for the Absolute Beginners - Hands-on Learn Kubernetes
